trans-unit.source: Provides data for a focus-changed event.
trans-unit.target: 提供焦點變更事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the object that received focus.
The child ID of the object that received focus.
trans-unit.target: 收到焦點之物件的子系識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object identifiers that UI Automation clients can use to link an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.
trans-unit.target: `idObject`和`idChild`參數包含[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)]物件 UI 自動化用戶端可以使用連結的識別項<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>至`IAccessible`較舊的可存取技術應用程式中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the child [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] identifier of the object receiving focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得收到焦點之物件的子 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] 識別項。

trans-unit.source: Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application.
trans-unit.target: 物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)]是識別類別目錄的應用程式中的可存取物件的 32 位元值。

trans-unit.source: The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.
trans-unit.target: `idObject`和`idChild`參數包含物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)]用戶端可以使用連結<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>至`IAccessible`較舊的可存取技術應用程式中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)] object that generated the event.
trans-unit.target: 取得產生事件之 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] 物件的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aa](~/includes/tlasharptla-aa-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element that is receiving focus.
For possible values, see [Object Identifiers](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/msaa/msaaccrf_5q05.asp) in the Microsoft Active Accessibility documentation.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值，請參閱[物件識別元](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/msaa/msaaccrf_5q05.asp)Microsoft Active Accessibility 文件中。

trans-unit.source: Object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] are 32-bit values that identify categories of accessible objects within an application.
trans-unit.target: 物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)]是識別類別目錄的應用程式中的可存取物件的 32 位元值。

trans-unit.source: The `idObject` and `idChild` parameters contain the object [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] that clients can use to link an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> to an `IAccessible` object in an older accessible technology application.
trans-unit.target: `idObject`和`idChild`參數包含物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)]用戶端可以使用連結<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>至`IAccessible`較舊的可存取技術應用程式中的物件。
